arabic.title: أعرف واحدة
text: ولا دموع ولا صبر أيام وسنين
فى الدنيا دى كده بني أدمين

english.title: 3arif wa7da
text: You know ! That i know someone ( a girl ) who didn't got any sweet word from her lover
Do you know that I know a girl who haven't spent with her lover any good moment
He haven't told her " I love you " .. and didn't call her " my sweetheart"
Why is she patient with him ? and why is she sacrificiing for him ?
Do you know who is it ? It 's me
Is there anyone who loves someone else and hurt him like this ?
Is there anybody who prefer sacrifice his life for his lover ?
Is there anyone who has a time to waste it .. and don't cry over what he missed ? No tears ? no patience in days and years ?
Is it okey for anybody in the world , to hurt who surround you ?
That is human people , with their torture to each other , they are okey and fine !!

english.title: Ana min ghirak bakoun
text: you know the most that i didn't take from the one i love
not even a tender word you know the most
i didn't live with the one i love not even a moment here
he didn't even say "i love you" to her ,he didn't call here "baby"
and she was pascient,and sacrifying,you know why?do you know who is she?
is there anywone who loves someone that hurts him this way
and who's satisfied about sacrifycing his life ,doesn anyone has the time
to waste like this and who doesn't cry about the past
no tears no pascience of days and years
does anyone take his injury for granted like this oh humain being?
they got satisfied and confortable with their tortures
without you,i'm a night without moon
a ship without sails , plants that need water
a step without a road ,a song without lyrics,life without a body
a castle that were filled with awaked hearts
and in a moment a heart were broken like a diamond in your hands
you left it ,and it became a stone
i'm like that without you ,without you i'm
missing without meeting a tear without eyes
uncurable injuries ,in your existence there is security
in your absence there is danger,without you i'm
a step without a road ,a song without lyrics,life without a body
a castle that were filled with awaked hearts
and in a moment a heart were broken like a diamond in your hands
you left it ,and it became a stone
i'm like that without you ,without you i'm
missing without meeting a tear without eyes
uncurable injuries ,in your existence there is security
in your absence there is danger,without you i'm

arabic.title: ده حبيبي
text: من غير حبيبي و لو دقيقه

english.title: That's my love
text: without my love even for a minute
I announced it to you and you should know
Bring me a hand shake(let me meet him)
or even a glance from his eyes(let me see him)
Oh.. If you knew what shape I am in
without him ,but how would you know?
Do you know how much he means to me?
He means the world to me(in my eyes)
And the most precious of all men
is the shoulder I cry on (comforter)
Yet I see him every where
I even think of him when I am asleep and awake
Close by close by close by
In a time(era) where true love seized to exist
Why did you take my love
Do you know how much he means to me?
He means the world to me(in my eyes)
And the most precious of all men
is the shoulder I cry on (comforter)

arabic.title: ضحكت ليا سنيني
text: لو ده حلم يا ناس.. خلوني سيبوني ..
فين كان لقلبي كل ده فين ..
ايوه دوبت في حبه يا ناس
دي سنين وسنين.. وانا قلبي حزين ..

english.title: My years laughed with me
text: song's name: my years laughed with me
when my eyes saw my lover
the dream that I lived in my nights
in my mind and I cannot forget
All that love is because of me
It feels (like living in) another world
If it is a dream,leave me and let me be In that dream which I live in
and I say (to myself) that this melancholy is my destiny
and my heart has been satisfied
And I've been waiting and (finally) got you my lover
Where were all of this for my heart
every dream that I've asked for and craved for
and have been living with (each one of) them
My heart is melted because of his love and that's it
Yes it was melted from his love you people
When he said (this words) to me he changed my situation
and I lived my beautiful nights
and I say (to myself) that this melancholy is my destiny\
and my heart has been satisfied
And I've been waiting and (finally) got you my lover

arabic.title: عيب عليك
text: ما يقاش في قلبي ليك شعور
ما يقاش في قلبي ليك شعور

english.title: Shame on you
text: The tiniest (least) word I say to you
What happened to me will happen to you
By the old(past),yes and the new(present,and future)
All of this will back fire on you
My right(what is mine),I am not leaving  to no one
Of what I have seen(experienced),I became really
I was crazy,now I am sane
Who would have blamed me if I have acted
There are no need to these words
That I will return to you one day
do not mess with me(acting a thousand roles)
I am sure of my self, am not bloating
No feelings towards you are left in my heart
My right(what is mine),I am not leaving  to no one
Of what I have seen(experienced),I became really
I was crazy,now I am sane
Who would have blamed me if I have acted
Why would you keep on torturing me
You have hurt me in the past
You have no place, It is over , leave me

arabic.title: قابلنا
text: لا مد ايديه ولا شاف بي عينيه ..
وانا كنت خلاص راح أقول لعينيه ..
بس انا من يومها ما قبلتوش
لا مد ايديه ولا شاف بي عينيه ..
لا مد ايديه ولا شاف بي عينيه ..
مش عارفه أيه اللي حصلي أيه ..
ومش عارفه ليه انا ملت ليه ..
لا مد ايديه ولا شاف بي عينيه ..
وانا كنت خلاص راح أقول لعينيه ..
بس انا من يومها ما قبلتوش

english.title: Met us
text: And shot us, and left us in the middle of fire
Didn't give us a hand,and didn't even see us with his own eyes
A lover tortured by  night and day
The night ,and my sleepless heart during its nights
Taught me  words ,my whole life ,I wouldn't have said
And I was about to tell his eyes
But since that day I haven't met him
And shot us,and left us in the middle of fire
Didn't give us a hand,and didn't even see us with his own eyes
A lover tortured by  night and day
And love , oh father, has no cure(medicine)
and shot us, and left us in the middle of fire
Didn't give us a hand,and didn't even see us with his own eyes
A lover tortured by  night and day
I don't know what happened to me
when with his eyes he saluted me(throw me a salute)
I don't know why I leaned towards him
And wandered with my thought about him without any words

arabic.title: لقيت معاك
text: الدنيا وما فيها بالناس اللي فيها
حاجات حاسه بيها حاجات نفسي فيها
انا ايه بقولهولك بيني وبين نفسي
من قلبي بدعيلك اكتر ما بدعي لنفسي
ولقيت معاك كل اللي بحلم بيه
واللي بفكر فيه واللي زمان ياما من زمان
يا اجمل ما شافت وهاتشوف عينيا
انا ايه بقولهولك بيني وبين نفسي
من قلبي بدعيلك اكتر ما بدعي لنفسي
ولقيت معاك كل اللي بحلم بيه
واللي بفكر فيه واللي زمان ياما من زمان

english.title: I've found in you
text: The world and what's in it and the people that's (live) in it
don't worth a minute, I live it in your arms
Thing that I feel and things that I want
I don't talk about them and tell you that I feel them
When you are near me, You don't know for real
the things that I tell to my self
and the things that happen to me, even when I pray
I wish for you more than I wish for myself
And I've found in you all that I dream of
and I think of and what my heart is waiting for for so so long
You are touching my heart and your soul feels me
You are the most beautiful thing that my eyes saw and will see
There is no one like you that understands me like you
I have no other than yourself that is longing for me
When you are near me, You don't know for real
the things that I tell to my self
and the things that happen to me, even when I pray
I wish for you more than I wish for myself
And I've found in you all that I dream of
and I think of and what my heart is waiting for for so so long

arabic.title: لون عنيك
text: هو ده اللي انا نفسي فيه
هو ده اللي انا نفسي فيه
هو ده اللي انا نفسي فيه
حبك في قلبي يوم ورا يوم

english.title: Lawn Aneik
text: the color of your eyes the tenderness of your hands
the color of your eyes the tenderness of your hands
so i can't hide it to you
why every time i get upset i run to you?
and why every time i'm happy i think about you?
the precious things are always chip for you
i passed you by ,i left my heart with you
i love you and i love the speech with you
with you oh baby with you i live the life with you
why every time i get upset i run to you?
and why every time i'm happy i think about you?
the precious things are always chip for you
i passed you by ,i left my heart with you
i love you and i love the speech with you
with you oh baby with you i live the life with you
why can't i stand getting away from you for one day
and the sleep is angry with my eyes oh baby the sleep
your love increases in my heart day after day
why every time i get upset i run to you?
and why every time i'm happy i think about you?
the precious things are always chip for you
i passed you by ,i left my heart with you
i love you and i love the speech with you
with you oh baby with you i live the life with you

arabic.title: ما أقدرش أقول
text: مقدرش اقول احساسى كان لعبه فـايديك
عشان احساسى هو اللى كان هيموت عليك
مقدرتش اشوف احلامى قصادى و ملمسهاش
وقلبى كان هيضيع لو سابك سيبته عااش
وقبل ما امشى احب اقولك مش هنسااااك
ولا عمرى هنسى الدنيا اللى انا عشتها وياااك
وان كنت مقدرتش حبى مش هجرح فييك
حبيتك حب محدش حبه لحد مفييش
وبرغم الحب اللى انا حبيته محبتنيش
كان قلبى عارف ان في حد فحياتك
بس غصب عنه داب و اتشد ليييك
مقدرتش اشوف احلامى قصادى و ملمسهاش
وقلبى كان هيضيع لو سابك سيبته عااش
وقبل ما امشى احب اقولك مش هنسااااك
ولا عمرى هنسى الدنيا اللى انا عشتها وياااك
وان كنت مقدرتش حبى مش هجرح فييك

english.title: Ma2darsh A2ol
text: i can't tell my feeling was a toy in your hands
cause my feelings were willing to die for you
i couldn't watch my dreams beside me and i can't touch them
and my heart was about to be lost if he left you but when you left him it lived
and before i go i wanna tell you i won't forget you
and i'll never forget the world i lived with you
and if you haven't appreciate my love i won't hurt you
i loved you with a love that has never been lused by someone else
and despite the love that i love dyou with ,you didn't love me
my heart knew that there was someone in your life
but despite it ,it melted and was attached to you
i couldn't watch my dreams beside me and i can't touch them
and my heart was about to be lost if he left you but when you left him it lived
and before i go i wanna tell you i won't forget you
and i'll never forget the world i lived with you
and if you haven't appreciate my love i won't hurt you

arabic.title: ندمانة
text: أنا في حياتك مش أي واحدة والسلام
أنا حبي ليك يا حبيبي عمرة ما كان كلام
لو هتنسي قول علي الدنيا السلام
أنا لما حبيتك بجد حبيت أوي
معرفش ان الحب دة عندك رخيص أوي
دة كان مكانك في قلبي عالي نزل أوي
تشوف قلبي ملوش قيمة عشان عشقاك
تشوف قلبي ملوش قيمة عشان عشقاك

english.title: Regretful
text: I'm not just any girl in your life
My love for you baby was never just talks
If you're going to forget, say goodbye to this world
I did love you so very much
I've never thought that this love is so worthless for you
You had a great place in my heart, now it's almost non-existent
I regret being a dedicated lover
I'm so upset of how things have become for me
I regret being a dedicated lover
I'm so upset of how things have become for me
It was my fault from the beginning
I closed my eyes and surrendered myself to you
I closed my eyes and surrendered myself to you
my weakness with you made you stronger and made you
think that my heart is worthless just because I was in love with you
my weakness with you made you stronger and made you
think that my heart is worthless just because I was in love with you

english.title: Hatrouh
text: you will leave,so leave and make me suffer more
because you know my heart lives in pain
you will leave,so leave and make me suffer more
because you know my heart lives in pain
you're gonna let go, so let go,i have to let go too(verb "abe3 "means sell or betray)
so that i can learn how no to belive in the ones who let go
i love you i love you i had to love you
cause i have a good heart and your love is selfish
you're gonna let go, so let go,i have to let go too
so that i can learn how no to belive in the ones who let go
i love you i love you i had to love you
cause i have a good heart and your love is selfish
oh years, years where are you going to
if you're going to the suffering ................(i don't know the meaning of nasebna) and to whom we're gonna leave the happiness
oh years, years where are you going to
if your going to the suffernig...............and to whom we're gonna leave the happiness
the heart of the believer is his guide and he doesn't like lies
so that i can learn how no to belive in the ones who let go
i love you i love you i had to love you
cause i have a good heart and your love is selfish
oh years, years where are you going to
if your going to the suffernig...............and to whom we're gonna leave the happiness

arabic.title: واحشني حبيبي
text: واحشني حبيبي روح قلبي دة هو عمري و كياني
و أقول بكرة دة هايجيني يدوب كل أحزاني
و مين غيرة يداويني و مين في الدنيا دي مكانة
و مين من نفسي يحميني و مين في قلبوا و حنانوا
لما يغيب عني و ينساني لية بتزيد حيرتي و حرماني
و ابقا لوحدي و اقفة مكاني لا عارفة أروح و لا عارفة أجي
عينيا لية ما داقتش نوم سهرانة لية أنا كل يوم
و أقول حبيبي بكره هيجي إمتي حبيبي تاني هتيجي
لما يغيب عني و ينساني لية بتزيد حيرتي و حرماني
و ابقا لوحدي و اقفة مكاني لا عارفة أروح و لا عارفة أجي
وحشني حبيبي روح قلبي دة هو عمري و كياني
و أقول بكرة دة هايجيني يدوب كل احزاني
و مين غيرة يداويني و مين في الدنيا دي مكانة
و مين من نفسي يحميني و مين في قلبوا و حنانوا
لما يغيب عني و ينساني لية بتزيد حيرتي و حرماني
و ابقا لوحدي واقفة مكاني لا عارفة أروح و لا عارفة أجي

english.title: I Miss my Love
text: I miss my love, he's my heart's soul, my life and my being
And I say: Tomorrow he'll come and dissolve all my sadness
Who else but him could heal me and who in this world could take his place?
And who else could protect me from myself? And who has a heart like his and tenderness like his?
When he goes away and forgets me, why does my confusion and deprivation increase
And I remain alone, standing in my place. I can't come nor go
Why haven't my eyes tasted sleep? Why do I stay up everyday?
And I say: Tomorrow my love will come, when will you come, oh love?
Tomorrow he will come back, my love
When he goes away and forgets me, why does my confusion and deprivation increase
And I remain alone, standing in my place. I can't come nor go
I miss my love, he's my heart's soul, my life and my being
And I say: Tomorrow he'll come and dissolve all my sadness
Who else but him could heal me and who in this world could take his place?
And who else could protect me from myself? And who has a heart like his and tenderness like his?
When he goes away and forgets me, why does my confusion and deprivation increase
And I remain alone, standing in my place. I can't come nor go
